description: Identifier for the translation rule or grouping within this table.
Category or source key indicating which data domain or feed the mapping applies to; likely distinguishes source systems; confirm with SME.
Original code or value from incoming data to be translated to the standardized equivalent.
Standardized internal code or value resulting from the translation, used for consistent processing and reporting.
Product type indicator for which this mapping applies; likely denotes fuel-related items; confirm with SME.
Optional default unit cost associated with the translated item when applied; if absent, cost is sourced from the transaction or pricing; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the mapping, usage, or exceptions.
Flag indicating whether using this mapping should adjust an asset's meter/odometer or hour readings; likely boolean; confirm with SME.
User ID or process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User ID or process that last updated the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
Asset class to which the mapping applies, if restricted; confirm with SME.
